alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing an anilide group in which the carboxamide group is substituted with a benzene ring. They have the general structure RNC(=O)R', where R,R'= benzene.
alternative_parents.name: Benzanilides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a diphenylmethane moiety, which consists of a methane wherein two hydrogen atoms are replaced by two phenyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Diphenylmethanes

alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids or derivatives carrying a halogen atom at the 3-position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: 3-halobenzoic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Carboxamide derivatives of salicylic acid. Salicylic acid is the ortho-hydroxylated derivative of benzoic acid.
alternative_parents.name: Salicylamides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carboxamido substituent attached to a benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Benzamides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acyl moiety of benzoic acid with the formula (C6H5CO-).
alternative_parents.name: Benzoyl derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Iodophenols carrying a iodine at the C4 position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: P-iodophenols

alternative_parents.description: Iodophenols carrying a iodine at the C2 position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: O-iodophenols

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more iodine atoms attached to a benzene.
alternative_parents.name: Iodobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing one or more chlorine atoms attached to a benzene moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Chlorobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a benzene ring which bears a methane group.
alternative_parents.name: Toluenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl iodide functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl iodides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl chloride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a hydroxyl group, which is indirectly attached to a carbonyl via an intervening vinyl (>C=C<) moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Vinylogous acids

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a secondary carboxylic acid amide functional group, with the general structure RC(=O)N(R')H (R,R'=alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Secondary carboxylic acid amides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds having the structure RC#N; thus C-substituted derivatives of hydrocyanic acid, HC#N.
alternative_parents.name: Nitriles

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and an iodine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organoiodides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as diphenylacetonitriles. These are cyclic aromatic compounds containing a diphenylacetonitrile moiety, which consists of a diphenylmethane linked to and acetonitrile to form 2,2-diphenylacetonitrile.

direct_parent.description: Cyclic aromatic compounds containing a diphenylacetonitrile moiety, which consists of a diphenylmethane linked to and acetonitrile to form 2,2-diphenylacetonitrile.
direct_parent.name: Diphenylacetonitriles

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Cyclic aromatic compounds containing a diphenylacetonitrile moiety, which consists of a diphenylmethane linked to and acetonitrile to form 2,2-diphenylacetonitrile.
subclass.name: Diphenylacetonitriles

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
